query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS RCQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RCQ_F ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.HYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RCQ_H ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.GKD = '5' AND A.CCG ='B' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RCQ_TS FROM (
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.GNO ,A.GDATE ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CAB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CAA ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CHB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CHA ELSE A.BSU END BSU ,A.KND ,A.HYN ,A.GKD ,B.CCG
FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT ,CS126_HNO HNO ,CS126_GNO GNO ,MIN(CS126_USD) USD ,MIN(CS126_ADT) ADT ,MAX(CS126_UMR) UMR ,MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ ,CASE WHEN MIN(CS126_ADT) >= MIN(CS126_USD) THEN MIN(CS126_ADT) ELSE MIN(CS126_USD) END GDATE ,MAX(CS126_KND) KND ,MAX(CS126_HYN) HYN ,MAX(CS126_GKD) GKD ,MAX(A.CS126_ARA) ARA ,MAX(A.CS126_BSU) BSU ,MIN(B.CS157_IKD) IKD
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD > A.CS126_ADT AND B.CS157_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_GKD IN ( '4', '5' ) AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND CASE WHEN CS126_ADT >= CS126_USD THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_USD END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE#
GROUP BY CS126_PJT,CS126_HNO,CS126_GNO,CS126_SEQ
) A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO AND B.EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_GND = 'D' ) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET RCQ = B.RCQ ,RCQ_F = B.RCQ_F ,RCQ_H = B.RCQ_H ,RCQ_TS = B.RCQ_TS
